vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ERC20Migrator.beginMigration (ERC20Migrator.sol#614-620):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(newToken.isMinter(this)) (ERC20Migrator.sol#617)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _newToken (ERC20Migrator.sol#619)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20Migrator.migrate (ERC20Migrator.sol#628-631) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_newToken.mint(account,amount) (ERC20Migrator.sol#630)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20Migrator.constructor.legacyToken (local variable @ ERC20Migrator.sol#590) shadows:
	- ERC20Migrator.legacyToken (function @ ERC20Migrator.sol#598-600)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20Migrator.beginMigration.newToken (local variable @ ERC20Migrator.sol#614) shadows:
	- ERC20Migrator.newToken (function @ ERC20Migrator.sol#605-607)
